title: Google\Cloud\ResourceManager\V3\UpdateTagKeyRequest
name: UpdateTagKeyRequest
description:
The request message for updating a TagKey.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.resourcemanager.v3.UpdateTagKeyRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.tag_key
params.description: Required. The new definition of the TagKey. Only the description and etag fields can be updated by this request. If the etag field is not empty, it must match the etag field of the existing tag key. Otherwise, FAILED_PRECONDITION will be returned.

params.name: data.update_mask
params.description: Fields to be updated. The mask may only contain description or etag. If omitted entirely, both description and etag are assumed to be significant.

params.name: data.validate_only
params.description: Set as true to perform validations necessary for updating the resource, but not actually perform the action.
